reports.suggestion_message:
To solve this problem, you can try the following approaches:


- If the issue is not solved by updating the dependencies, a fix has to be
implemented by those dependencies. You can help with that by notifying the
maintainers of this problem (e.g. by creating a bug report) or by proposing a
fix to the maintainers (e.g. by creating a pull request):

  - anymap@1.0.0-beta.2
  - Repository: https://github.com/chris-morgan/anymap
  - Detailed warning command: `cargo report future-incompatibilities --id 1 --package anymap@1.0.0-beta.2`

- If waiting for an upstream fix is not an option, you can use the `[patch]`
section in `Cargo.toml` to use your own version of the dependency. For more
information, see:
https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/overriding-dependencies.html#the-patch-section

per_package.anymap@1.0.0-beta.2:
The package `anymap v1.0.0-beta.2` currently triggers the following future incompatibility lints:
> [0m[1m[33mwarning[0m[0m[1m: adding an auto trait `Send` to a trait object in a pointer cast may cause UB later on[0m
> [0m   [0m[0m[1m[38;5;12m--> [0m[0m/home/k/.cargo/registry/src/index.crates.io-1949cf8c6b5b557f/anymap-1.0.0-beta.2/src/any.rs:37:40[0m
> [0m    [0m[0m[1m[38;5;12m|[0m

> [0m[1m[38;5;12m...[0m
> [0m[1m[38;5;12m144[0m[0m [0m[0m[1m[38;5;12m|[0m[0m [0m[0mimpl_clone!(dyn CloneAny + Send);[0m

> [0m    [0m[0m[1m[38;5;12m= [0m[0m[1mwarning[0m[0m: this was previously accepted by the compiler but is being phased out; it will become a hard error in a future release![0m
> [0m    [0m[0m[1m[38;5;12m= [0m[0m[1mnote[0m[0m: for more information, see issue #127323 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/127323>[0m
> [0m    [0m[0m[1m[38;5;12m= [0m[0m[1mnote[0m[0m: this warning originates in the macro `impl_clone` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)[0m
> 
> [0m[1m[33mwarning[0m[0m[1m: adding auto traits `Send` and `Sync` to a trait object in a pointer cast may cause UB later on[0m
> [0m   [0m[0m[1m[38;5;12m--> [0m[0m/home/k/.cargo/registry/src/index.crates.io-1949cf8c6b5b557f/anymap-1.0.0-beta.2/src/any.rs:37:40[0m

> [0m[1m[38;5;12m...[0m
